submission:
from typing import List

class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self,colors, k):
        res=0
        i=0
        j=1
        n=len(colors)
        while j<n+k and i<n:
            temp1=j
            temp2=temp1%n
            while colors[temp2]!=colors[(temp2-1+n)%n] and temp1<n+k-1:
                temp1+=1
                temp2=temp1%n
            res+=max(temp1-i-k+1,0)
            i=temp1
            j=i+1
        return res
